delay.description: Minimal delay between two password recovery or validation email

failedLoginBeforeDelay.description: When a delay is added between two attempt to authenticate

postValidation.description: Allow user to create their account without validating their email first

skipEmailValidation.description: Do not even validate the email at all

failureRedirect.description: Redirect to this page when email validation failed

registerRedirect.description: Redirect to this page once email is validate to finish the registration process

salt.description: Number of salt iteration for bcrypt.hashSync

successRedirect.description: Redirect to this page when email validation succeed

models.description:
Define the map of models
* indicates all models

key is a Store name
the string[] represent all valids attributes to store files in * indicates all attributes

maxFileSize.description: Define the maximum filesize to accept as direct upload

Duration.description: Represents a time duration that defaults to seconds but supports composite strings.

source.description: Format sourceServiceName:sourceId or sourceId if source is this service

sources.description:
List of sources to load and merge ( in order )
Format sourceServiceName:sourceId or sourceId if source is this service

domain.description:
if true domain will be set to the request hostname
if undefined no domain will be output (browser will use the current domain and only this one)
if a string is provided it will be used as the domain

When provided a domain is setting the cookie to be available to all subdomains

secure.description:
If not set will be true if https request and false otherwise
If defined it will be set to the value

Duration.description: Represents a time duration that defaults to seconds but supports composite strings.

expiresIn.description:
expressed in seconds or a string describing a time span zeit/ms.

Eg: 60, "2 days", "10h", "7d". A numeric value is interpreted as a seconds count. If you use a string be sure you provide the time units (days, hours, etc), otherwise milliseconds unit is used by default ("120" is equal to "120ms").

Schema.description: Interface to specify the Service parameters
Schema.title: CronService

expiresIn.description:
expressed in seconds or a string describing a time span zeit/ms.

Eg: 60, "2 days", "10h", "7d". A numeric value is interpreted as a seconds count. If you use a string be sure you provide the time units (days, hours, etc), otherwise milliseconds unit is used by default ("120" is equal to "120ms").

autoCreate.description: Create first set of key if does not exist

autoRotate.description: Try to rotate keys when they expire in days

keyActiveLifespan.description:
Number of hours a key should be used for encryption

if auto-rotate is not set this

keyLifespan.description: Number of hours allowed to decrypt data encrypted with this key

transport.description: Define the type of transport to use

addLogProducerLine.description: Add file and line number of the log producer (if possible)

limit.description: Max size of the logs in memory

logLevel.description: Specify the log level of this service

type.description: Type of delayer registered in WaitDelayerFactoryRegistry

expire.description: Number of seconds before droping message

maxConsumers.description:
Max number of queue consumers
Queue will auto increase to this max number if queue is loaded
and it will decrease to just one consumer if no messages are available

timeout.description: Number of seconds to wait for receiving new message

workerDelayer.description: Delayer between two failed attempts to process messages

workerParallelism.description: Define if worker should process multi message received in //

modelAliases.description: Model Aliases to allow easier rename of Model

persistence.description: Persist the data in a file

delay.description: By default only save once every 1s if modified

additionalModels.description:
Additional models

Allow this store to manage other models

defaultModel.description:
When __type model not found, use the model
If strict is setup this parameter is not used

forceModel.description: If set, Store will ignore the __type

model.description: Webda model to use within the Store

modelAliases.description: Model Aliases to allow easier rename of Model

persistence.description: Persist the data in a file

strict.description:
Allow to load object that does not have the type data

If set to true, then the Store will only managed the defined _model and no
model extending this one

models.description:
List of models to include

If model is prefixed with a ! it will be excluded

nameTransfomer.description: Transform the name of the model to be used in the URL

multiple.description: Define if it sends one or several notification per user

senders.description:
Notification service that will send
The order of the array is important if multiple is false
When multiple is `false` the first available NotificationService will
be used, otherwise every available NotificationService will be used

bind.description:
If defined along with portNumber used to bind specific address
for dedicated http server

includeRequestMetrics.description:
Include request served by Webda

It should generate common http_* metrics

partitionHistogram.description: Do not partition histogram with requests labels

portNumber.description: If defined will launch another http server to serve the scaper

models.description:
List of models to include

If model is prefixed with a ! it will be excluded

nameTransfomer.description: Transform the name of the model to be used in the URL

swaggerVersion.description:
Swagger version to use

https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/swagger-ui/3.19.5/swagger-ui.css
https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/swagger-ui/3.19.5/swagger-ui-bundle.js
https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/swagger-ui/3.19.5/swagger-ui-standalone-preset.js

allowHiddenFiles.description:
Serve also . prefixed files
. files usually have some secrets and should not be served

indexCacheControl.description:
Cache control for index file
SPA usually do not cache the index file

indexFallback.description:
Return the index file for any unfound resource
Useful for single page application

rootRedirect.description: Add the / root to redirect to /{url}

url.description: URL on which to serve the content

overrideWarning.description: Display a WARNING if a route is overriden

Storable<any, any>.description:
A Storable object is an object that can be stored in a database or anywhere else
and can be retrieved later

It has a primary key, a toJSON method and an Events object
